nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire deployed a mining complex to the planet Alabash. Staffed entirely by droids and controlled by a Terreene Brainiac class artificial intelligence named Control, it was capable of extracting and processing six hundred metric tons of alantium per month. The complex was a five hundred meter by five hundred meter platform that hovered above the surface of the planet at a height of twenty meters. The complex sucked up a one hundred-meter-wide section of the surface, extracted the valuable ore, and extruded the remains behind the facility. Reekeene's Roughnecks Green squad was tasked with infiltrating and destroying the facility.
